title: What is C?
text: C is a general-purpose programming language created by Dennis Ritchie at the Bell Laboratories in 1972.
It is a very popular language, despite being old. The main reason for its popularity is because it is a fundamental language in the field of computer science.
C is strongly associated with UNIX, as it was developed to write the UNIX operating system.

title: Get Started
text: This tutorial will teach you the basics of C.
When you are finished with this tutorial, you will be able to write C programs and create real-life examples.
It is not necessary to have any prior programming experience.
